mapper.sql:
FROM productQA a left join member b on a.memberSeq = b.memberSeq left join product c on a.productSeq = c.productSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.productSeq = #{productSeq} AND a.DelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.qaSeq ,a.title ,a.question ,a.qaRegtime ,a.answerNY ,a.productSeq ,a.memberSeq ,a.DelNy ,b.id ,b.nm ,c.product_name
ORDER BY a.qaSeq DESC

SELECT a.qaSeq ,a.title ,a.question ,a.qaRegtime ,a.answerNY ,a.productSeq ,a.memberSeq ,a.DelNy ,b.id ,b.nm ,c.product_name FROM productQA a left join member b on a.memberSeq = b.memberSeq left join product c on a.productSeq = c.productSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.qaSeq = #{qaSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE productQA SET answerNy = 1 WHERE qaSeq = #{qaSeq}
